attributes.action: Save Food Technology and Mrs Wilson for getting the Sack in St Peters School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Food Technology teacher has to leave because the school is forcing her to. Another teacher was asked to leave first but she said no. This means that we will lose Mrs. Wilson and Food Technology UNTIL 
2010.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
